headline: Martin Marietta Announces Fourth-Quarter and Full-Year 2024 Earnings Conference Call
summary: RALEIGH, N.C., Jan. 22, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Martin Marietta Materials, Inc. (NYSE:MLM) (“Martin Marietta” or the “Company”) will host its fourth-quarter and full-year 2024 earnings conference call on Wednesday, February 12, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. Eastern Time. The Company will release results for the quarter and year ended December 31, 2024, that morning before the market opens. A live, listen-only webcast and supplemental information will be accessible on the Investors section of the Company’
